snippet: Bernard Tomic said he was not distracted by the presence of his father when he lost a first-round match to Benjamin Becker, 6-4, 6-7 (4), 7-6 (4), at Queen’s Club in London.
abstract: Bernard Tomic says he was not distracted by the presence of his father when he lost a first-round match to Benjamin Becker, at Queen’s Club in London; authorities barred John Tomic from watching his son’s matches in person after he was accused of assaulting his son’s hitting partner; but tournament officials agreed to let him purchase a spectator ticket.
lead_paragraph: Bernard Tomic said he was not distracted by the presence of his father when he lost a first-round match to Benjamin Becker, 6-4, 6-7 (4), 7-6 (4), at Queen’s Club in London.
